stateDiagram

NO_AUTH

NO_AUTH : NO_AUTH

LOADING_LOGOUT

LOADING_LOGOUT : LOADING_LOGOUT

LOADING_LOGOUT : enter / #123; sendLogoutRequest() #125;

OFFLINE

OFFLINE : OFFLINE

OFFLINE : enter / #123; notifyOffline() #125;

LOADING_SESSION

LOADING_SESSION : LOADING_SESSION

LOADING_SESSION : enter / #123; sendSessionRequest() #125;

WAITING

WAITING : WAITING

WAITING : enter / #123; waitForRetry() #125;

state ONLINE_GROUP {

        LOADING_LOGIN

        LOADING_LOGIN : LOADING_LOGIN

        LOADING_LOGIN : enter / #123; sendLoginRequest() #125;

        LOADING_PROFILE

        LOADING_PROFILE : LOADING_PROFILE

        LOADING_PROFILE : enter / #123; sendProfileRequest() #125;

        CONNECTING_EVENTS

        CONNECTING_EVENTS : CONNECTING_EVENTS

        CONNECTING_EVENTS : enter / #123; connectEvents() #125;

        ACTIVE

        ACTIVE : ACTIVE

        ACTIVE : enter / #123; notifyActive() #125;

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

NO_AUTH --> LOADING_LOGIN : login

LOADING_LOGOUT --> NO_AUTH : didFail

LOADING_LOGOUT --> NO_AUTH : logoutLoaded

OFFLINE --> LOADING_SESSION : networkRestored

OFFLINE --> NO_AUTH : logout

LOADING_SESSION --> LOADING_LOGIN : didFail

LOADING_SESSION --> CONNECTING_EVENTS : sessionLoaded

WAITING --> LOADING_SESSION : retry

WAITING --> OFFLINE : networkLost

WAITING --> NO_AUTH : logout

ONLINE_GROUP --> WAITING : didFail

ONLINE_GROUP --> OFFLINE : networkLost

ONLINE_GROUP --> LOADING_LOGOUT : logout

LOADING_LOGIN --> LOADING_PROFILE : loginLoaded

LOADING_PROFILE --> CONNECTING_EVENTS : profileLoaded

CONNECTING_EVENTS --> ACTIVE : didConnectEvents

ROOT.(InitialState) --> NO_AUTH
